publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1144 Fiona McLeod: Scottish Rugby Union-That the Parliament recognises the extensive consultation carried out by the Scottish Rugby Union; commends them on their new pricing structure for the autumn test season which includes free tickets for under 18's and students and supports them in their endeavours to bring rugby to the young people of Scotland.
S1M-1144 Scottish Rugby Union (lodged on 1 September 2000) Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-1144 Scottish Rugby Union (lodged on 1 September 2000) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Richard Lochhead*
S1M-1144 Scottish Rugby Union (lodged on 1 September 2000) Shona Robison*

S1M-1144 Fiona McLeod: Scottish Rugby Union-That the Parliament recognises the extensive consultation carried out by the Scottish Rugby Union; commends them on their new pricing structure for the autumn test season which includes free tickets for under 18's and students and supports them in their endeavours to bring rugby to the young people of Scotland. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Richard Lochhead, Shona Robison, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-1144 Scottish Rugby Union (lodged on 1 September 2000) Christine Grahame*, Tricia Marwick*, Andrew Wilson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Colin Campbell*, Michael Russell*
S1M-1144 Scottish Rugby Union (lodged on 1 September 2000) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-1144 Fiona McLeod: Scottish Rugby Union-That the Parliament recognises the extensive consultation carried out by the Scottish Rugby Union; commends them on their new pricing structure for the autumn test season which includes free tickets for under 18's and students and supports them in their endeavours to bring rugby to the young people of Scotland. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Richard Lochhead, Shona Robison, Ms Sandra White, Christine Grahame, Tricia Marwick, Andrew Wilson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Colin Campbell, Michael Russell, Tommy Sheridan

S1M-1144 Fiona McLeod: Scottish Rugby Union—That the Parliament recognises the extensive consultation carried out by the Scottish Rugby Union; commends them on their new pricing structure for the autumn test season which includes free tickets for under 18’s and students and supports them in their endeavours to bring rugby to the young people of Scotland. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Richard Lochhead, Shona Robison, Ms Sandra White, Christine Grahame, Tricia Marwick, Andrew Wilson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Colin Campbell, Michael Russell, Tommy Sheridan
S1M-1144 Scottish Rugby Union (lodged on 1 September 2000) Fergus Ewing*, Des McNulty*
S1M-1144 Scottish Rugby Union (lodged on 1 September 2000) Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-1144 Fiona McLeod: Scottish Rugby Union—That the Parliament recognises the extensive consultation carried out by the Scottish Rugby Union; commends them on their new pricing structure for the autumn test season which includes free tickets for under 18’s and students and supports them in their endeavours to bring rugby to the young people of Scotland. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Richard Lochhead, Shona Robison, Ms Sandra White, Christine Grahame, Tricia Marwick, Andrew Wilson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Colin Campbell, Michael Russell, Tommy Sheridan, Fergus Ewing, Des McNulty, Nora Radcliffe

S1M-1144 Fiona McLeod: Scottish Rugby Union—That the Parliament recognises the extensive consultation carried out by the Scottish Rugby Union; commends them on their new pricing structure for the autumn test season which includes free tickets for under 18’s and students and supports them in their endeavours to bring rugby to the young people of Scotland. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Richard Lochhead, Shona Robison, Ms Sandra White, Christine Grahame, Tricia Marwick, Andrew Wilson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Colin Campbell, Michael Russell, Tommy Sheridan, Fergus Ewing, Des McNulty, Nora Radcliffe

S1M-1144 Fiona McLeod: Scottish Rugby Union—That the Parliament recognises the extensive consultation carried out by the Scottish Rugby Union; commends them on their new pricing structure for the autumn test season which includes free tickets for under 18’s and students and supports them in their endeavours to bring rugby to the young people of Scotland. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Richard Lochhead, Shona Robison, Ms Sandra White, Christine Grahame, Tricia Marwick, Andrew Wilson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Colin Campbell, Michael Russell, Tommy Sheridan, Fergus Ewing, Des McNulty, Nora Radcliffe
S1M-1144 Scottish Rugby Union (lodged on 1 September 2000) Mr Kenny MacAskill*

S1M-1144 Fiona McLeod: Scottish Rugby Union—That the Parliament recognises the extensive consultation carried out by the Scottish Rugby Union; commends them on their new pricing structure for the autumn test season which includes free tickets for under 18’s and students and supports them in their endeavours to bring rugby to the young people of Scotland. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Richard Lochhead, Shona Robison, Ms Sandra White, Christine Grahame, Tricia Marwick, Andrew Wilson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Colin Campbell, Michael Russell, Tommy Sheridan, Fergus Ewing, Des McNulty, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Kenny MacAskill
